args.name: from
args.question: what email address do you want to monitor?

args.name: subject
args.question: what email subject do you want to monitor?

args.name: label
args.question: email with what label do you want to monitor?

examples: notify me if receive an email
notify me if receive an email from $from
notify me if receive an email with subject $subject

receive_important_email.doc: receive an email from others which is marked as important
receive_important_email.confirmation: receive an email which is marked as important on GMail
examples: notify me if receive an email marked as important

receive_primary_email.doc: receive an email in category primary from others
receive_primary_email.confirmation: receive an email in category primary
examples: notify me if receive an email in category primary

args.name: to
args.question: Who do you want to send to?

args.name: message
args.question: What message do you want to send?

send_email.confirmation: send an email to $to with subject $subject on GMail
examples: send an email to $to with subject $subject with message $message
send an email to $to with subject $subject with message $message using my gmail

args.name: to
args.question: Who do you want to send to?

args.name: message
args.question: What message do you want to send?

send_picture.doc: send an email with a picture attached
send_picture.confirmation: send a picture to $to with subject $subject on GMail
examples: send a picture to $to with subject $subject
send a picture to $to with subject $subject using my gmail

get_latest.confirmation: get the latest email on GMail
examples: get the latest email with label $label
get the latest email with subject $subject
